<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Limited">[Hermean Heritor](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=128)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Legacy - Age of Ashes" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=270" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 73</row>

</column>

With the restrictions on Hermean citizenship lifted, you may have fled the city of Promise or have spent some of your childhood in the company of someone who did.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) skill, and the [Legal Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Multilingual](/Feats.aspx?ID=814) skill feat or the [Assurance](/Feats.aspx?ID=756) skill feat for Society.
